Entrepreneur/Public Figure

Proudest moment in your career?

Created a github repository (Nigerian Version), it was named "Fatai" with loads of commands, & within a few months, it already had 7,000 users. Interviewed Phaticusthiccy,(The Co- Founder and only active developer on @AsenaDev.) He has won multiple awards on GitHub, also familiar with, JavaScript -Golang -Assembly -Assembly X86 -Bash -Lua -Fortan -Emacs - Lisp -Make -Ruby -Perl -Cheif -Python 2-3 -LaTeX (for conversation) -Fastai (for voice chat) -Tensorflow (for Language processing) -RGANI (his reverse gan Interpolation system). Also created another repository which caught the attention of many, "Openweaver" (a SaaS New York tech company), wrote about it.> Philadelphia & Moonwalker's Bot Repository With 1.4k stars on Heroku (a cloud platform as a service supporting several programming languages.)

Quote to live by in your industry?

"You cannot be loaded & not be needed... So chase your dreams, when you got it!, It becomes reality".. (Philip Smith)..

5 things we need to know about you?

1.

Writer, writes leisure times on entertainment, fictional stories & non fictional stories, education, news, articles e.t.c. Launched @9jahotblog consisting of few writers, GENAMIE ROTIMI THEOLA & Peter Sonibare(CEPHAS).

2.

Web Designer & Manager, create sites, currently managing @9jahotblog, @Truefactss, & @Aledxa Movies. Watch online with ease & download.

3.

Social Media Management, very well experienced in the smm marketing strategy, increasing engagements on posts, elevating account reach, live & followers. Personal page @Philip Smith Hired by 5 individuals, feel free to hire for your page also.

4.

Motivational Influence, writes few lines on despair, dark hours, Relationship, Giving up, Deep Quotes! writes song lyrics too.

5.

Loves reading, loves writing stories too. For music, lyrics, dance, all literary works, biggest motivation is Michael Jackson.
